C G I L M P R S T U

C

com.mogreet.mercury - package com.mogreet.mercury
Provides the classes necessary to create a Mercury object (requests) and a Response object.
com.mogreet.mercury.system - package com.mogreet.mercury.system
Provides the classes necessary to create system requests that test connectivity to Moms API servers.
com.mogreet.mercury.transaction - package com.mogreet.mercury.transaction
Provides the classes necessary to create transaction requests that can initiate SMS or MMS sends and lookup information on sends.
com.mogreet.mercury.user - package com.mogreet.mercury.user
Provides the classes necessary to create user requests that expose users' basic information, transactions, and campaign status.

I

info(HashMap<String, String>) - Method in class com.mogreet.mercury.Mercury
Returns the user carrier and handset info if available.
Info - Class in com.mogreet.mercury.user
The Info object contains the response from an Mercury.info(java.util.HashMap) request to the Moms API.

L

lookup(HashMap<String, String>) - Method in class com.mogreet.mercury.Mercury
Returns the info, status and history of the requested transaction.
Lookup - Class in com.mogreet.mercury.transaction
The Lookup object contains the response from a Mercury.lookup(java.util.HashMap) request to the Moms API.
Lookup(Document) - Constructor for class com.mogreet.mercury.transaction.Lookup
Creates a new Lookup response object.

M

Mercury - Class in com.mogreet.mercury
The Mercury is an object that allows to execute three types of requests (system, user and transaction) to the Moms API.
Mercury(int, String) - Constructor for class com.mogreet.mercury.Mercury
Constructs a new Mercury.

P

ping() - Method in class com.mogreet.mercury.Mercury
Tests connectivity to the Moms API servers.
Ping - Class in com.mogreet.mercury.system
The Ping object contains the response from a Mercury.ping() request to the Moms API.
Ping(Document) - Constructor for class com.mogreet.mercury.system.Ping
Creates a new Ping response object.

R

Response - Class in com.mogreet.mercury
Response is the super class for all the kind of responses that can be obtained from the Moms API requests.
Response(Document) - Constructor for class com.mogreet.mercury.Response
Constructs a new Response object.
responseIsValid() - Method in class com.mogreet.mercury.Response
Checks if the response code is 1.

U

uncache(HashMap<String, String>) - Method in class com.mogreet.mercury.Mercury
